detaileddescription.para: Retrieves kernel version of the machine
Retrieves cpu model name of the machine
Sums the number of processing units of the machine

simplesect.para: counter the sum of processing units

detaileddescription.para: Retrieves uptime(in seconds) of the machine
Formats uptime(in seconds) to days, hours, minutes, and seconds
Retrieves load average of the machine
Retrieves cpu usage of the machine

parameterdescription.para: *prev input that represents the last CPU usage state
*curr output that represents the current CPU usage state, and will be passed back in to pfs_load_avg on its next call

detaileddescription.para: Retrieves memory usage of the machine
Retrieves tasks info of the machine

simplesect.para: 0 if success, or EXIT_FAILURE if otherwise
